item.title: Visiting the USS Hornet (June/July 2011)
item.description: Below, a verbatim transcript of Joe’s trip to see the USS Hornet in Alameda CA., recently re-discovered. Visiting the Hornet Day 1 –Â June 27 I got up early and had some breakfast with my brother, Sammy. Then Mimi drove us to the airport in Boston. The flight lasted 6 hours. On the flight I played games and looked at the Rocky Mountains. We met my cousin, Tiger, at the airport in San Francisco.
